model.name: pausable
model.title: Pausable
model.description: Pausable EIP to support resuming processing from last known offset.
model.label: eip,routing

id.description: Sets the id of this node

note.description: Sets the note of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Disables this EIP from the route.

consumerListener.description: Sets the consumer listener to use

untilCheck.description: References to a java.util.function.Predicate to use for until checks. The predicate is responsible for evaluating whether the processing can resume or not. Such predicate should return true if the consumption can resume, or false otherwise. The exact point of when the predicate is called is dependent on the component, and it may be called on either one of the available events. Implementations should not assume the predicate to be called at any specific point.
